title: Box dimensions
body:
Hi,
can we know box dimensions and weight so we can plan shipping cost?

Thanks!

replies.body:
Sure, with my handy dandy ruler I landed with:

Length:  34cm
Width: 51cm
Depth:  12cm
Weight:  12.85 lb


That's just the game, though.  I don't have the dimensions/weight after packaging, but hopefully that helps some?
W-wait... How did you measure the weight with a ruler?
Thanks, this'll really help me make forgeries! -er, plan shipping cost.
